subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|酉|孝|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – fermenting in a vessel, making alcoholic drink. 孝 is composed of “young + old”, hence connotations of “aging (in a vase), fermentation”.
